title: Egan Bernal joins Tom Pidcock in Tour de France return 18 months after brutal crash
content:
The 2019 Tour de France winner returns for his first grand tour since his near-fatal crash early in 2022: 'Be strong, because life only comes to us once.'

Read the full article at Egan Bernal joins Tom Pidcock in Tour de France return 18 months after brutal crash on Velo.
